definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pound, pound fine, bray (NH id.; Aram [[כְּתַשׁ]]; Syr. kta4 is strive, contend; Zinj. [[כרש]] break in pieces, shatter, DHM:Sendsch. 58);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[אִם־תִּכְתּוֹשׁ אֶת־הָאֱוִיל בַּמַּכְתֵּשׁ]] Pr 27:22 if thou shouldest bray the fool in the mortar.
